articles.author: Siddhant Chandra
articles.title: 1Xiaomi 12 Series Display Specifications Tipped Ahead of December 28 Launch - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Xiaomi 12 lineup s display details have leaked ahead of its December 28 launch. The base model is tipped to feature a 6.28-inch full-HD+ display.
articles.content: Xiaomi 12 series is officially confirmed to debut in China on December 28. So far, its various specifications and features have either been officially teased or leaked. Now, more details have surface… [+1692 chars]
